sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; class RelatedEvents extends React.Component { constructor (props){ super(props); this.state = { events: [], search_info: [], isLoading: 1 } } componentDidMount() { var related_flags = encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(this.props.flags)); Promise.all([ fetch('/wp-json/occasiongenius/v1/suggested/' + this.props.parent_id + '?flags=' + related_flags ), ]) .then(([res]) => Promise.all([res.json()])) .then(([suggested_data]) => this.setState({ events: suggested_data.events, search_info: suggested_data.data, isLoading: 0 })); } render() { //console.table(this.props.flags); console.table(this.props.parent_id); console.table(this.state.search_info); return ( <>
